actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide additional compensation for certain disabled veterans who require constant medical aid and attendance.

summary.text: Increases from $528 to $560 the amount of additional wartime disability compensation payable to a veteran in need of regular aid and attendance. Requires the payment of an additional monthly allowance of $860 to any such veteran in need of constant aid and attendance because of severe helplessness.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide additional compensation for certain disabled veterans who require constant medical aid and attendance.
